children.name: whatsUp
children.response: I... I... I don't know. I just haven't been the same since Saturday night.

children.name: whaHappen
children.text: This wouldn't have anything to do with a band of theives and/or a man dressed in all black with white glowing eyes?

children.name: iKnewIt
children.text: Just as I thought. So, which way did they go?
children.response: Just keep heading north along the east shore road here. Then take a right when you hit the first intersection.
